name: Replica Monodrone
languages: can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
entries: If the monodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 3 (1d6 damage) piercing damage.
